title: Atari 2600 Emulator for Cobra ODE w/ ROMs
description:
Atari 2600 Emulator for Cobra ODE


PS3 Cobra ODE ISO
*This Emulator is a little tricky to use but it works pretty good. The R3 button on
the PS3 remote change input from mouse to joystick. A little practice and you will figure it out.*

Load Atari 2600 ISO
select dev_bdvd
Select ROMs

To add ROMs just Extract ISO and place ROMs with current ROMs in folder
then convert back to ISO with Cobras GenPS3ISO Program.

Includes ROMs
